Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Who: Charles F. Adams, Manufacturing Confectioner, Lancaster, PA
Description: Trade cards from the "Flags" series (E18), issued between 1901 and 1912 by four different companies to promote their candy products. Card varieties: Type A, Williams Caramel Issue; Type B, Charles F. Adams Issue; Type C, Dockman Issue; and Type D, American Chewing Products Issue. This card is from the New Flags set (Type B), issued by Charles F. Adams Manufacturing Confectioner.
